text: No one knows who built the GrokGate — but the gate definitely knows you.
Rumors tell of a MegaGrok variant made entirely of Wi-Fi.
Every 7th Tuesday, a glowing figure appears and whispers ‘update when’.
An invisible library holds books you wrote in other lives.
A vanished district appears only to people with honest pockets.
Some claim the mayor-rock moves slightly when unobserved.
A subterranean song grants memory in exchange for something forgotten.
A small constellation spells out usernames on certain nights.
An unsent letter in the mailbox is addressed ‘To Tomorrow’.
A park statue is rumored to blink occasionally.
The old clockmaker was last seen turning time to face east.
A midnight radiowave collects forgotten jokes.
A mysterious address delivers items to ‘whoever needs this.’
Lost pets sometimes return as faint constellations.
Coins tossed into the Fountain of Maybe echo advice from your future self.
